title.rendered: Paarl vs Cape Town, South Africa T20 League, 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Paarl: Jason Roy, Jos Buttler (wk), Wihan Lubbe, David Miller (c), Eoin Morgan, Evan Jones, Corbin Bosch, Bjorn Fortuin, Codi Yusuf, Lungi Ngidi, Tabraiz Shamsi

Cape Town: Dewald Brevis, Ryan Rickelton, Rassie van der Dussen, Grant Roelofsen (wk), Sam Curran, Delano Potgieter, George Linde, Rashid Khan (c), Odean Smith, Kagiso Rabada, Jofra Archer

Venue: Boland Park, Paarl

Pitch Report

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 127

2nd innings average score: 149

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Even contest between the bat and ball

Wins

Batting 1st: 33%

Batting 2nd: 67%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Bjorn Fortuin is the only bowler in the tournament to have bagged a hat-trick of three-fors at Paarl.

With regular contributions with bat and ball, Odean Smith has been a part of the Ultimate Team for three consecutive games.

When these teams met earlier in the league, Dewald Brevis and Jos Buttler were the captain and vice-captain of the Ultimate Team respectively.

Jason Roy’s recent numbers don’t make a great reading. He has managed only 67 runs in his last 5 innings.

In the last 3 games at Boland Park, only 2 half-centuries have been registered.

In the same period, 33% of the top-order batters have been dismissed for a single-digit score.

Unlike other grounds, Paarl has seen limited sixes being hit. Only 18 sixes have been launched in the last 3 games.
